holarki.cmd.tz.help: Your timezone is %s [%s] with the %s clock. Current time: %s. Use /timezone set <ZoneId> to change the timezone or /timezone clock <12|24> to change the clock format.

holarki.cmd.tz.clock.ok: Clock format updated to %s. Times will appear like %s [%s].

holarki.err.migrate.locked: Migrations are locked by another process.
